get.summary: Get locations by stripeId with companyId
get.description: Get locations by stripeCustomerId or stripeSubscriptionId with companyId

put.description: Update SaaS subscription for given locationId and customerId

post.description: Disable SaaS for locations for given locationIds

Enable SaaS for Sub-Account (Formerly Location) based on the data provided

! This feature is only available on Agency Pro ($497) plan.
Pause Sub account for given locationId
Bulk update rebilling for given locationIds

get.description: Fetch all agency subscription plans for a given company ID
Fetch subscription details for a specific location from location metadata

post.description: Enable SaaS mode for multiple locations with support for both SaaS v1 and v2

200.description: Bulk SaaS enable operation completed successfully

get.description: Fetch all SaaS-activated locations for a company with pagination
Fetch a specific SaaS plan by plan ID
Get count of SaaS locations for a company

bearer.name: token-id
bearer.description: Use the Access Token generated by exchanging API Key for token id

Location-Access.name: Authorization
Location-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Location

Agency-Access.name: Authorization
Agency-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Company

data.description: Response data from the bulk disable SaaS operation

stripeAccountId.description: Stripe account id(Required only for SaaS V1)

name.description: Name of the stripe customer(Required only for SaaS V1)

email.description: Email of the stripe customer(Required only for SaaS V1)

stripeCustomerId.description: Stripe customer id if exists(Required only for SaaS V1)

isSaaSV2.description: Denotes if it is a saas v2 or v1 sub-account

contactId.description: Contact id to be mapped to the new sub-account if exists(Required Only for SaaS V2)

providerLocationId.description: Agency subaccount used for payment provider integration(Required Only for SaaS V2)

saasPlanId.description: Required only while pre-configuring saas subscription

priceId.description: Required only while pre-configuring saas subscription

data.description: Response data from the enable SaaS operation

product.description: The product to update rebilling for

locationIds.description: Array of location IDs to update rebilling for

optIn.description: Enable the product for the locations

enabled.description: Enable the rebilling for the locations

markup.description: Additional value to be added in terms of percentage. For example, if the product price is $100 and the markup is 5, the amount charged to will be $105.

success.description: Indicates if the rebilling update was successful

saasProducts.description: Array of SaaS products included in the plan

addOns.description: Array of add-ons included in the plan

isSaaSV2.description: Indicates if this is a SaaS V2 plan
Indicates if the SaaS is V2

priceId.description: Price ID for the SaaS plan

locationIds.description: Array of location IDs to enable SaaS for

isSaaSV2.description: Indicates if the SaaS is V2

actionPayload.description: Action payload for the bulk enable SaaS operation

success.description: Indicates if the bulk enable SaaS operation was successful

message.description: Message indicating the bulk enable SaaS operation
message.example: Bulk enable SaaS operation completed successfully

bulkActionUrl.description: URL for the bulk enable SaaS operation

isSaaSV2.description: Indicates if the SaaS is V2

planId.description: Unique identifier for the SaaS plan

companyId.description: Company ID associated with the SaaS plan

saasProducts.description: Array of SaaS products included in the plan

addOns.description: Array of add-ons included in the plan

isSaaSV2.description: Indicates if this is a SaaS V2 plan
